## Summary of gross returns

```{r}
df_summary <- df_summary_to_df(summary(exp(data_df)))
```


```{r}
df_l_summary <- df_summary_to_df(summary(exp(data_df_l)))
```

```{r}
df_summary_all <- cbind(
    df_summary[, 1:2],
    df_l_summary,
    df_summary[, 3:ncol(df_summary)]
  )

knitr::kable(
  df_summary_all, 
  digits = 3
)
```


## Ranking
```{r}
knitr::kable(rank_summary(df_summary_all, sorting = rep("hi", ncol(df_summary_all))), digits = 3)
```


## Correlations and covariance

Correlations
```{r}
knitr::kable(
  as.data.frame(
    round(cor(data_df[1:4]), 4)
  ), 
  digits = 3
)
```

Covariances
```{r}
knitr::kable(
  as.data.frame(
    round(cov(data_df[1:4]), 4)
  ), 
  digits = 3
)
```
